items.name: Bologna
items.description:
The story of darkness has an interesting twist, as the baggy windbreaker swirls in the alley, the world converges in the strong aroma of morning coffee. The smell spreads and diffuses, wordless but fascinating. With coffee-like deep brown under our feet, the kitten‘s body is unseen, but its bright eyes still shine through.

The coloring process of this type of flooring is unique, using the reactive stain coloring technique, wood’s natural colors and grains react differently to the water-based environment-friendly chemicals, such color variations represent wood’s natural characteristics. The water-based UV Lacquer coating type provides great protection to the wood planks, it not only prevents the permeating of water moisture but is also more durable and environment-friendly.

subs.name: Profiling
subs.desc: Tongue & Groove, beveled on long sides, micro-beveled on short sides

subs.name: Adhesive
subs.desc: Made with a formaldehyde-free adhesive (EPI);Product contains No Added Formaldehyde (NAF, NAUF);CARB ATCM Phase II Compliant (<0.05ppm formaldehyde)

items.name: La Scala
items.description:
Mostly, when we’re chasing a sentiment, we are searching for our first love. Just like La Scala, it remains the most natural breath and genuine. The realist emotion from inside is presented in front of your eyes, and filterless freshness shines through your heart like spots of sunlight.

The coloring process of this type of flooring is unique, using the reactive stain coloring technique, wood’s natural colors and grains react differently to the water-based environment-friendly chemicals, such color variations represent wood’s natural characteristics. The water-based UV Lacquer coating type provides great protection to the wood planks, it not only prevents the permeating of water moisture but is also more durable and environment-friendly.

items.name: Lucca
items.description: This collection of flooring restores the most authentic characteristics of wood to the greatest extent, embodying a pursuit of authenticity and nature. It showcases a sense of freedom and a release of nature, allowing you to fully experience the beauty and power of the natural world. Moreover, this flooring line seamlessly blends with your home decor, infusing your living space with natural beauty and providing unparalleled comfort for you and your family.

items.name: Palermo
items.description:
A concealing language, with no complicated rhetorical vocabulary, wordless just like Mother Earth, but on the inside, it was colorful. Walking on earth feels like floating, deep brown intertwined with yellow-tan, the dark grains extend and stretch just like the valley, going through various mountains and rivers.

The coloring process of this type of flooring is unique, using the reactive stain coloring technique, wood’s natural colors and grains react differently to the water-based environment-friendly chemicals, such color variations represent wood’s natural characteristics. The water-based UV Lacquer coating type provides great protection to the wood planks, it not only prevents the permeating of water moisture but is also more durable and environment-friendly.

items.name: Vicenza
items.description:
Maybe it was just a blushing moment, maybe more distance is needed. A white yarn flutters above the cliff, accompanied by the wuthering of the wilderness blows. Suddenly, all of the unevenness turn into grains and textures, appearing on the wood planks. The story contains small rural villages, huge ruts, and the warmth of that stone fireplace.

The coloring process of this type of flooring is unique, using the reactive stain coloring technique, wood’s natural colors and grains react differently to the water-based environment-friendly chemicals, such color variations represent wood’s natural characteristics. The water-based UV Lacquer coating type provides great protection to the wood planks, it not only prevents the permeating of water moisture but is also more durable and environment-friendly.

items.name: Naples
items.description:
You’ve probably heard of that harbor, where a weathered sailboat always docks. We’re sailing under the afterglow of sunset, and drifting in the galaxy. If you are on board with us, a bowl of hot soup pairs perfectly with the candle lights, and a blanket will cover you from a long, chilled night.

The coloring process of this type of flooring is unique, using the reactive stain coloring technique, wood’s natural colors and grains react differently to the water-based environment-friendly chemicals, such color variations represent wood’s natural characteristics. The water-based UV Lacquer coating type provides great protection to the wood planks, it not only prevents the permeating of water moisture but is also more durable and environment-friendly.
